Lighthouse (500 B18) | https://getlighthouse.com | Senior Front End Engineer | San Francisco, CA | Onsite

Employees quit managers, not companies. If you've ever worked at a dysfunctional, hyper-growth startup, or a big company wrecked by politics, you've experienced how bad management can make work miserable. It’s crazy managers aren’t given more help. We're changing that by helping with the fundamentals of good management through software.

We are currently in 500 Startups Batch 18 and have hundreds of paying customers. You’re a fit for this role if you:

  - Enjoy working on a small team

  - Are excited about implementing a modern front end framework of your choice 

  - Interested in taking lead on writing a style guide 

  - Passionate about building great user experiences
Our current stack currently includes: Ruby/Rails, Capistrano, HTML/Sass, Bootstrap, jQuery, Postgres, Redis

* Interested? Email jay@getlighthouse.com mentioning Hacker News in the subject line. Please, no recent code school grads.
